36 
38 //
39 // Defines the Tracker base class, which is templated on the following types:
40 // -- Value function (V)
41 // -- [Planner] state (PS), state msg (MPS)
42 // -- [Tracker] state (TS), state msg (MTS), control (TC), control msg (MTC)
43 // -- Tracking error bound service (SB)
44 // -- Planner dynamics service (SP)
45 //
46 // All trackers essentially work by subscribing to state and reference topics
47 // and periodically (on a timer) querying the value function for the optimal
48 // control, then publishing that optimal control. Trackers also must provide
49 // services that other nodes can use to access planner dynamics and bound
50 // parameters.
51 //
53 
54 #ifndef FASTRACK_TRACKING_TRACKER_H
55 #define FASTRACK_TRACKING_TRACKER_H
56 
57 #include <fastrack/utils/types.h>
58 #include <fastrack/utils/uncopyable.h>
59 
60 #include <ros/ros.h>
61 
62 namespace fastrack {
63 namespace tracking {
64 
65 template<typename V, typename TS, typename TC, typename MTS, typename MTC,
66  typename PS, typename MPS, typename SB, typename SP>
67 class Tracker : private Uncopyable {
68 public:
69  virtual ~Tracker() {}
70 
71  // Initialize from a ROS NodeHandle.
72  bool Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n);
73 
74 protected:
75  explicit Tracker()
76  : initialized_(false) {}
77 
78  // Load parameters and register callbacks.
79  bool LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n);
80  bool RegisterCallbacks(const ros::NodeHandle& n);
81 
82  // Callback to update tracker/planner state.
83  inline void TrackerStateCallback(const MTS::ConstPtr& msg) {
84  tracker_x_ = FromRos(msg);
85  }
86  inline void PlannerStateCallback(const MPS::ConstPtr& msg) {
87  planner_x_ = FromRos(msg);
88  }
89 
90  // Service callbacks for tracking bound and planner parameters.
91  inline bool TrackingBoundServer(
92  const SB::Request::ConstPtr& req, SB::Response::ConstPtr& res) const {
93  res = value_.TrackingBound().ToRos();
94  }
95  inline bool PlannerDynamicsServer(
96  const SP::Request::ConstPtr& req, SP::Response::ConstPtr& res) const {
97  res = value_.PlannerDynamics().ToRos();
98  }
99 
100  // Timer callback. Compute the optimal control and publish.
101  inline void TimerCallback(const ros::TimerEvent& e) const {
102  control_pub_.publish(ToRos(value_.OptimalControl(tracker_x_, planner_x_)));
103  }
104 
105  // Convert states/control from/to ROS messages.
106  TS FromRos(const MTS::ConstPtr& msg) const = 0;
107  PS FromRos(const MPS::ConstPtr& msg) const = 0;
108  MTC ToRos(const TC& control) const = 0;
109 
110  // Most recent tracker/planner states.
111  TS tracker_x_;
112  PS planner_x_;
113 
114  // Publishers and subscribers.
115  std::string tracker_state_topic_;
116  std::string planner_state_topic_;
117  std::string control_topic_;
118 
119  ros::Subscriber tracker_state_sub_;
120  ros::Subscriber planner_state_sub_;
121  ros::Publisher control_pub_;
122 
123  // Services.
124  std::string bound_name_;
125  std::string planner_dynamics_name_;
126 
127  ros::ServiceServer bound_srv_;
128  ros::ServiceServer planner_dynamics_srv_;
129 
130  // Timer.
131  ros::Timer timer_;
132  double time_step_;
133 
134  // Value function.
135  V value_;
136 
137  // Flag for whether this class has been initialized yet.
138  bool initialized_;
139 
140  // Name of this class, for use in debug messages.
141  std::string name_;
142 }; //\class Tracker
143 
144 // ----------------------------- IMPLEMEMTATION ----------------------------- //
145 
146 // Initialize from a ROS NodeHandle.
147 template<typename V, typename TS, typename TC, typename MTS, typename MTC,
148  typename PS, typename MPS, typename SB, typename SP>
149 bool Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::
150 Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
151  name_ = ros::names::append(n.getNamespace(), "Tracker");
152 
153  // Initialize value function.
154  if (!value_.Initialize(n)) {
155  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to initialize value function.", name_.c_str());
156  return false;
157  }
158 
159  // Load parameters.
160  if (!LoadParameters(n)) {
161  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to load parameters.", name_.c_str());
162  return false;
163  }
164 
165  // Register callbacks.
166  if (!RegisterCallbacks(n)) {
167  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to register callbacks.", name_.c_str());
168  return false;
169  }
170 
171  initialized_ = true;
172  return true;
173 }
174 
175 // Load parameters.
176 template<typename V, typename TS, typename TC, typename MTS, typename MTC,
177  typename PS, typename MPS, typename SB, typename SP>
178 bool Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::
179 LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
180  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
181 
182  // Topics.
183  if (!nl.getParam("topic/tracker_state", tracker_state_topic_)) return false;
184  if (!nl.getParam("topic/planner_state", planner_state_topic_)) return false;
185 
186  // Service names.
187  if (!nl.getParam("srv/bound", bound_name_)) return false;
188  if (!nl.getParam("srv/planner_dynamics", planner_dynamics_name_))
189  return false;
190 
191  // Time step.
192  if (!nl.getParam("time_step", time_step_)) return false;
193 
194  return true;
195 }
196 
197 // Register callbacks.
198 template<typename V, typename TS, typename TC, typename MTS, typename MTC,
199  typename PS, typename MPS, typename SB, typename SP>
200 bool Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::
201 RegisterCallbacks(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
202  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
203 
204  // Services.
205  bound_srv_ = nl.advertiseService(bound_name_.c_str(),
206  &Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::TrackingBoundServer, this);
207  planner_dynamics_srv_ = nl.advertiseService(planner_dynamics_name_.c_str(),
208  &Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::PlannerDynamicsServer, this);
209 
210  // Subscribers.
211  planner_state_sub_ = nl.subscribe(planner_state_topic_.c_str(), 1,
212  &Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::PlannerStateCallback, this);
213  tracker_state_sub_ = nl.subscribe(tracker_state_topic_.c_str(), 1,
214  &Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::TrackerStateCallback, this);
215 
216  // Publisher.
217  control_pub_ = nl.advertise<MTC>(control_topic_.c_str(), 1, false);
218 
219  // Timer.
220  timer_ = nl.createTimer(ros::Duration(time_step_),
221  &Tracker<V, TS, TC, MTS, MTC, PS, MPS, SB, SP>::TimerCallback, this);
222 
223  return true;
224 }
225 
226 } //\namespace tracking
227 } //\namespace fastrack
228 
229 #endif
